about_the_game: Step back into the eerie nostalgia of 1980s and 1990s horror with "In the Middle", a spine-chilling survival game packed with retro PSX aesthetics and arcade-style mechanics. Immerse yourself in a haunted town where the ordinary becomes terrifying, and your day job at the local laundry is only the beginning of your nightmare. During the day, you manage the laundry. But when night falls, the machines become a source of terror, and survival is your only objective. With vintage-style models and pixelated graphics, "In the Middle" captures the essence of classic horror, delivering a perfect mix of suspense and old-school charm for veteran horror fans and new players alike. Prepare yourself for an unforgettable, thrilling experience where every shift could be your last! Will you survive the haunted laundry? Or will you become just another ghost story in town?
detailed_description: Step back into the eerie nostalgia of 1980s and 1990s horror with "In the Middle", a spine-chilling survival game packed with retro PSX aesthetics and arcade-style mechanics. With vintage-style models and pixelated graphics, "In the Middle" captures the essence of classic horror, delivering a perfect mix of suspense and old-school charm for veteran horror fans and new players alike. Prepare yourself for an unforgettable, thrilling experience where every shift could be your last! Will you survive the haunted laundry? Or will you become just another ghost story in town?
name: In The Middle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Relatively modern dedicated graphics card

short_description: A horror game where you work in a laundry shop and try to stop the cursed washing machines while doing your job.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Greek, Swedish
